about?"},{"lineNumber":109572,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あら、リセット。","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh, Reset."},{"lineNumber":109573,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お母様が孫を甘やかしてるだけよー","translatedEnglishLine":"Mother is just spoiling her grandchild."},{"lineNumber":109574,"originalJapaneseLine":"「甘やかす言うな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don’t say 'spoiling'."},{"lineNumber":109575,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"……"},{"lineNumber":109576,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし、うむ、いかんな」","translatedEnglishLine":"However, hmm, that’s not good."},{"lineNumber":109577,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私もついつい孫だからと甘やかしてしまう。","translatedEnglishLine":"I also end up spoiling him just because he’s my grandchild."},{"lineNumber":109578,"originalJapaneseLine":"　反省しなければ","translatedEnglishLine":"I must reflect on that."},{"lineNumber":109579,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今後はもっと厳しく接しよう」","translatedEnglishLine":"From now on, I shall be stricter."},{"lineNumber":109580,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……え？」","translatedEnglishLine":"...Huh?"},{"lineNumber":109581,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hm?"},{"lineNumber":109582,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、婿殿」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, son-in-law."},{"lineNumber":109583,"originalJapaneseLine":"「婿殿って言うな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don’t call me son-in-law."},{"lineNumber":109584,"originalJapaneseLine":"「断る。","translatedEnglishLine":"I refuse."},{"lineNumber":109585,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私はお前がパステルの婿となれば、","translatedEnglishLine":"I think it would be good in various ways if you became Pastel’s son-in-law."},{"lineNumber":109586,"originalJapaneseLine":"　色々な意味でいいと思っている」","translatedEnglishLine":"I truly believe it’s good for many reasons."},{"lineNumber":109587,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから婿殿と呼ばせてもらう」","translatedEnglishLine":"So I will call you son-in-law."},{"lineNumber":109588,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあいいや……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, whatever..."},{"lineNumber":109589,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……それより丁度良い。","translatedEnglishLine":"...More importantly, this is perfect."},{"lineNumber":109590,"originalJapaneseLine":"　探していた」","translatedEnglishLine":"I was looking for you."},{"lineNumber":109591,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、なにか用か？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh, do you need something?"},{"lineNumber":109592,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふむ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm..."},{"lineNumber":109593,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"......"},{"lineNumber":109594,"originalJapaneseLine":"ビビッドは少し困ったように固まった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Vivid froze, looking a little troubled."},{"lineNumber":109595,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hm?"},{"lineNumber":109596,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや……」","translatedEnglishLine":"No..."},{"lineNumber":109597,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やはり、いい。","translatedEnglishLine":"On second thought, it’s fine."},{"lineNumber":109598,"originalJapaneseLine":"　忘れて欲しい」","translatedEnglishLine":"I want you to forget it."},{"lineNumber":109599,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふわ〜っとビビッドが去って行く。","translatedEnglishLine":"Vivid drifted away softly."},{"lineNumber":109600,"originalJapaneseLine":"「って、こらこら」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, hey, wait."},{"lineNumber":109601,"originalJapaneseLine":"「？」","translatedEnglishLine":"?"},{"lineNumber":109602,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんな言われ方したら気になるだろうが」","translatedEnglishLine":"If you say it like that, I get curious."},{"lineNumber":109603,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……うむ」","translatedEnglishLine":"...Hmm."},{"lineNumber":109604,"originalJapaneseLine":"「では、うん……やはり頼むか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well then, yeah... I’ll ask after all..."},{"lineNumber":109605,"originalJapaneseLine":"「？　なんなんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"? What is it?"},{"lineNumber":109606,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これは婿殿にしか頼めないこと。","translatedEnglishLine":"This is something only a son-in-law can be asked to do."},{"lineNumber":109607,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そして、他のカラーには内密に進めて欲しい案件」","translatedEnglishLine":"And it’s a matter I want to proceed with confidentially from the other Colors."},{"lineNumber":109608,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええい、長い前置きはいらん。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh, enough with the long preambles."},{"lineNumber":109609,"originalJapaneseLine":"　スパッと用件は言わんか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Just get straight to the point already."},{"lineNumber":109610,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"......"},{"lineNumber":109611,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……デートして欲しい」","translatedEnglishLine":"...I want you to go on a date with me."},{"lineNumber":109612,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とりあえず街に出てみたが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I went out into town for now, but..."},{"lineNumber":109613,"originalJapaneseLine":"「本当にデートがここで良かったのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Was this really the right place for a date?"},{"lineNumber":109614,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、いい。","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, it’s fine."},{"lineNumber":109615,"originalJapaneseLine":"　遠出するほどじゃない」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's not worth going far away."},{"lineNumber":109616,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くれぇぷ屋はあるか？","translatedEnglishLine":"Is there a crepe shop?"},{"lineNumber":109617,"originalJapaneseLine":"　デートで食すと聞く」","translatedEnglishLine":"I heard people eat them on dates."},{"lineNumber":109618,"originalJapaneseLine":"「変なこと知ってるな」","translatedEnglishLine":"That’s weird knowledge."},{"lineNumber":109619,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どっかにあった気もするが、","translatedEnglishLine":"I feel like there was one somewhere,"},{"lineNumber":109620,"originalJapaneseLine":"　疎開でほとんどの店が閉まってるから、","translatedEnglishLine":"but since most shops are closed due to evacuation,"},{"lineNumber":109621,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今もあるかは分からんぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I don’t know if it’s still open."},{"lineNumber":109622,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それならそれでいい。","translatedEnglishLine":"That’s fine then."},{"lineNumber":109623,"originalJapaneseLine":"　デートが最大の目的だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"The main goal is just the date."},{"lineNumber":109624,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし、これ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"But this..."},{"lineNumber":109625,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hm?"},{"lineNumber":109626,"originalJapaneseLine":"二人でぷらぷらと町を散策する状況を","translatedEnglishLine":"Vivid considered the situation where the two of them aimlessly stroll through town."},{"lineNumber":109627,"originalJapaneseLine":"ビビッドが客観的に考える。","translatedEnglishLine":"Vivid thought objectively."},{"lineNumber":109628,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……デートでなく散歩？」","translatedEnglishLine":"...Isn’t this a walk rather than a date?"},{"lineNumber":109629,"originalJapaneseLine":"「安心しろ、男女が一緒に出かけたらデートだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Relax, when a man and woman go out together, it’s a date."},{"lineNumber":109630,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ほう」","translatedEnglishLine":"...I see."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんなでなんのおはなしー？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What are you all talking about?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お母様が孫を甘やかしてるだけよー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mother is just spoiling her grandchild.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私もついつい孫だからと甘やかしてしまう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I also end up spoiling him just because he’s my grandchild.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今後はもっと厳しく接しよう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From now on, I shall be stricter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私はお前がパステルの婿となれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think it would be good in various ways if you became Pastel’s son-in-law.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 色々な意味でいいと思っている」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I truly believe it’s good for many reasons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから婿殿と呼ばせてもらう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So I will call you son-in-law.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビビッドは少し困ったように固まった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Vivid froze, looking a little troubled.
I want you to forget it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふわ〜っとビビッドが去って行く。
「そんな言われ方したら気になるだろうが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you say it like that, I get curious.
Well then, yeah... I’ll ask after all...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これは婿殿にしか頼めないこと。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is something only a son-in-law can be asked to do.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、他のカラーには内密に進めて欲しい案件」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And it’s a matter I want to proceed with confidentially from the other Colors.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、長い前置きはいらん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh, enough with the long preambles.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スパッと用件は言わんか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just get straight to the point already.
...I want you to go on a date with me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とりあえず街に出てみたが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I went out into town for now, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本当にデートがここで良かったのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Was this really the right place for a date?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遠出するほどじゃない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's not worth going far away.
I heard people eat them on dates.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どっかにあった気もするが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I feel like there was one somewhere,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 疎開でほとんどの店が閉まってるから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but since most shops are closed due to evacuation,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今もあるかは分からんぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don’t know if it’s still open.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: デートが最大の目的だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The main goal is just the date.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人でぷらぷらと町を散策する状況を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Vivid considered the situation where the two of them aimlessly stroll through town.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビビッドが客観的に考える。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Isn’t this a walk rather than a date?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「安心しろ、男女が一緒に出かけたらデートだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Relax, when a man and woman go out together, it’s a date.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
